00039         protected void Button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00040         {
00041             //this is the edit button click (it's misnamed)
00042             //as long as the item in the list box is not null, then get the role and update it
00043             if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(editLabel.Text) != null)
00044             {
00045                 if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(editRoleNameBox.Text.Trim()) || String.IsNullOrEmpty(editRoleDescBox.Text.Trim()))
00046                 {
00047                     //either the desc or name are null - send a error message to the user and do not add the role
00048                     errorMessageLabel.Text = "Please enter a value for both Role Name and Role Description";
00049                     errorMessageLabel.Visible = true;
00050                 }
00051                 else
00052                 {
00053                     try
00054                     {
00055                         IRoleRepository roleRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IRoleRepository>();
00056 
00057                         //get the role indicated by the listbox number
00058                         Role updateMe = roleRepo.GetById(int.Parse(editLabel.Text));
00059 
00060                         //update the role
00061                         updateMe.role_name = editRoleNameBox.Text;
00062                         updateMe.role_desc = editRoleDescBox.Text;
00063 
00064                         roleRepo.SubmitChanges();
00065 
00066                         errorMessageLabel.Text = "Role has been editted";
00067                         errorMessageLabel.Visible = true;
00068                     }
00069                     catch (Exception theException)
00070                     {
00071                         //respond with error message
00072                         errorMessageLabel.Text = "Database error when editting role";
00073                         errorMessageLabel.Visible = true;
00074                     }
00075 
00076                     //clear the text boxes
00077                     editRoleNameBox.Text = "";
00078                     editRoleDescBox.Text = "";
00079 
00080                     //hide the panel
00081                     editPanel.Visible = false;
00082 
00083                     //update the role table to reflect changes
00084                     updateRoleTable();
00085                 }
00086             }
00087         }

00089         private void updateRoleTable()
00090         {
00091             //used to update the role table entries
00092             IRoleRepository roleRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IRoleRepository>();
00093 
00094             var query = from p in roleRepo.Roles
00095                         select p;
00096 
00097             //clear existing roles, get a new list (in case any are added / deleted / changed)
00098             this.roleDescriptionTable.Rows.Clear();
00099 
00100             this.roleDescriptionTable.Rows.Add(titleRow);
00101 
00102             //for every role that is in the database, add it as a row in the table
00103             foreach (var role in query)
00104             {
00105                 //instantiate a new row
00106                 TableRow row = new TableRow();
00107                 row.CssClass = "orderRow";
00108 
00109                 bool canEdit = true;
00110                 bool canDelete = true;
00111 
00112                 TableCell cellEdit = new TableCell();
00113                 if (canEdit)
00114                 {
00115                     ImageButton edit = new ImageButton();
00116                     edit.ImageUrl = "/images/edit.gif";
00117                     edit.ToolTip = "Edit";
00118                     edit.CommandArgument = role.roleID.ToString();
00119                     edit.Command += new CommandEventHandler(btnEditRole_Click);
00120                     cellEdit.Controls.Add(edit);
00121                 }
00122                 else
00123                 {
00124                     Image edit = new Image();
00125                     edit.ImageUrl = "/images/edit_gray.gif";
00126                     edit.ToolTip = "Edit";
00127                     cellEdit.Controls.Add(edit);
00128                 }
00129 
00130                 TableCell cellDelete = new TableCell();
00131                 if (canDelete)
00132                 {
00133                     ImageButton delete = new ImageButton();
00134                     delete.ImageUrl = "/images/delete.gif";
00135                     delete.ToolTip = "Delete";
00136                     delete.CommandArgument = role.roleID.ToString();
00137                     delete.Command += new CommandEventHandler(btnDeleteRole_Click);
00138                     cellDelete.Controls.Add(delete);
00139                 }
00140                 else
00141                 {
00142                     Image delete = new Image();
00143                     delete.ImageUrl = "/images/delete_gray.gif";
00144                     delete.ToolTip = "Delete";
00145                     cellDelete.Controls.Add(delete);
00146                     cellDelete.Enabled = false;
00147                 }
00148 
00149                 TableCell roleID = new TableCell();
00150                 roleID.Text = role.roleID.ToString();
00151 
00152                 TableCell roleName = new TableCell();
00153                 roleName.Text = role.role_name.ToString();
00154 
00155                 TableCell roleDesc = new TableCell();
00156                 roleDesc.Text = role.role_desc;
00157 
00158                 //add the row to the table
00159                 row.Cells.Add(cellEdit);
00160                 row.Cells.Add(cellDelete);
00161                 row.Cells.Add(roleID);
00162                 row.Cells.Add(roleName);
00163                 row.Cells.Add(roleDesc);
00164 
00165                 this.roleDescriptionTable.Rows.Add(row);
00166             }
00167         }

00170         {
00171             //get the permission ID as the command argument
00172             ImageButton btn = sender as ImageButton;
00173             int roleID = Int32.Parse(btn.CommandArgument);
00174 
00175             //update the text box when the delete panel becomes visible
00176             updateDeletePanel(roleID);
00177 
00178             //turn on the delete panel, turn off the edit and add panels
00179             editPanel.Visible = false;
00180             deletePanel.Visible = true;
00181             addPanel.Visible = false;
00182

00201         private void updateEditPanel(int roleID)
00202         {
00203             IRoleRepository roleRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IRoleRepository>();
00204 
00205             try
00206             {
00207                 Role displayMe = new Role();
00208                 displayMe = roleRepo.GetById(roleID);
00209 
00210                 editLabel.Text = roleID.ToString();
00211                 editRoleDescBox.Text = displayMe.role_desc;
00212                 editRoleNameBox.Text = displayMe.role_name;
00213 
00214             }
00215             catch (Exception theException)
00216             {
00217                 errorMessageLabel.Text = "Error retrieving role from the database";
00218                 errorMessageLabel.Visible = true;
00219             }
00220         }
00221

00225 
00226             try
00227             {
00228                 Role displayMe = new Role();

00244         protected void addSubmit_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00245         {
00246             //check to make sure the data is not null
00247 
00248             if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(addRoleDescBox.Text.Trim()) || String.IsNullOrEmpty(addRoleNameBox.Text.Trim()))
00249             {
00250                 //either the desc or name are null - send a error message to the user and do not add the role
00251                 errorMessageLabel.Text = "Please enter a value for both Role Name and Role Description";
00252                 errorMessageLabel.Visible = true;
00253             }
00254             else
00255             {
00256                 try
00257                 {
00258                     //access the database and add the new role, submit
00259                     IRoleRepository roleRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IRoleRepository>();
00260 
00261                     Role newRole = new Role();
00262 
00263                     newRole.role_desc = addRoleDescBox.Text;
00264                     newRole.role_name = addRoleNameBox.Text;
00265 
00266                     roleRepo.AddRole(newRole);
00267                     roleRepo.SubmitChanges();
00268 
00269                     errorMessageLabel.Text = "Role has been added";
00270                     errorMessageLabel.Visible = true;
00271                 }
00272                 catch (Exception theException)
00273                 {
00274                     //error message
00275                     errorMessageLabel.Text = "Database error when inserting new role";
00276                     errorMessageLabel.Visible = true;
00277                 }
00278 
00279                 //clear the text boxes
00280                 addRoleNameBox.Text = "";
00281                 addRoleDescBox.Text = "";
00282 
00283                 //hide the panel
00284                 addPanel.Visible = false;
00285 
00286                 //update the role table to reflect changes
00287                 updateRoleTable();
00288             }
00289         }
00290 
00291         protected void deleteSubmit_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00292         {
00293             //as long as the roleID in the label is not null, then get the role and delete it
00294             if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(deleteLabel.Text) == false)
00295             {
00296                 try
00297                 {
00298                     IRoleRepository roleRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IRoleRepository>();
00299 
00300                     //get the role indicated by the listbox number
00301                     Role deleteMe = roleRepo.GetById(int.Parse(deleteLabel.Text));
00302 
00303                     //delete the role
00304                     roleRepo.DeleteRole(deleteMe.roleID);
00305 
00306                     //try to submit
00307                     roleRepo.SubmitChanges();
00308 
00309                     errorMessageLabel.Text = "Role has been deleted";
00310                 }
00311                 catch (Exception theException)
00312                 {
00313                     //delete failed - a user is assigned to this role
00314                     errorMessageLabel.Text = "Cannot delete this role - a user is assigned to it";
00315                     errorMessageLabel.Visible = true;
00316 
00317                 }
00318 
00319                 //clear the text boxes
00320                 deleteRoleNameBox.Text = "";
00321                 deleteRoleDescBox.Text = "";
00322                 deleteLabel.Text = "";
00323 
00324                 //hide the panel
00325                 deletePanel.Visible = false;
00326 
00327                 //redraw the role table to reflect the change
00328                 updateRoleTable();
00329 
00330             }
00331         }
00332     }
